attributes.action: Hang or kill all peadophiles instead of locking them up for a few years then letting them out
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
After last week convicted paedophile Raymond Horne was let back into our country a free man, and gets to choose where he wants to live. so what if the area he chooses is near a local school or park?, what will be done?


the worst of it is he has re offended!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
